website_summaries.verdict: With an extra face plate for optional double-sided use and fire-resistant plastic exterior, this energy-efficient model gets top marks for its combination of safety features and functionality.
pros: Option to use a double-sided face is a nice benefit for users who may have people exiting a building from multiple sides
Bright headlights and the exit sign itself can run on battery backup if the power goes out
Initial assembly and setup is easy to accomplish
Unit consumes an efficient 2 watts when in operation
cons: For those who play music through FM radio in a business environment, this unit may interfere with their signal

customer_reviews.title: Exit Sign
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install, and quite bright. I'd give it more stars, but it generates a serious amount of radio interference, especially around 100 MHz which is in the middle of the FM band. A favorite radio station on 100.3 was very listenable before installing these exit signs, but now it is impossible to receive. If I turn of the power to the exit signs, the reception is fine. They also seem to wreak havoc on the AM radio band as well. This "feature" is not exclusive to this particular brand of sign. I've discovered that most LED exit signs do the same thing, including some that cost a LOT more money.
customer_reviews.author: chuxgarage

customer_reviews.title: An exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a unit that had quit working at our Church building. It was easy to replace, and it is working fine. There were enough options included that it could have worked in several different places, making it very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J

customer_reviews.title: Flexible install options.
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these at Church today. The installations were easy. I hung one from the ceiling and one for the side of the sign to a wall. There are other options. I have ordered three more and will installed them next week.
customer_reviews.author: BobRip

customer_reviews.title: Huge Savings
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace one in a store, locally they were $90! This was exactly the same as what I took down. Easy install (you will need to drill out the holes and opening to match your old one) works great.
customer_reviews.author: Blewzman

customer_reviews.title: Functions well as emergency exit light at econominical price
customer_reviews.text: An efficient ni-cd backup battery operated emergency/exit light fixture. Instructions packaged inside front cover. Cannot remove rear cover without opening front cover and releasing internal taps. Important to remember to connect battery plug (shipped unconnected) before completing installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good price, easy to install. The first one purchased was broken, that was returned and replaced. The replacement installed easily and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lockdown

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The lighting is excellent for a stairwell, where we use it. And to be able to aim the lights is a real plus. The only issue is that the screws provided do not fit a standard box, so I had to use the ones that were in the old exit sign.
customer_reviews.author: jOHN o.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and great price1
customer_reviews.text: I got 5 of these for my business. They were easy to hook up, are very bright and have new LED technology! Lots of mounting options and had the option tomake it a two faces sign. Would buy again if i needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great light at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Easy to install and the battery was even charged. Don't forget to plug the battery in like I did. Lights are bright and can be adjusted to aim almost anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: The back-up light doesn't work while push the test button ...
customer_reviews.text: The back-up light doesn't work while push the test button. The battery inside also has a label that say the battery need to be replaced next year. Returned and purchased a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Leung

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and well made. We were able to replace the existing light in just a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: An improvement over regular exit signs. The extra lights ...
customer_reviews.text: An improvement over regular exit signs. The extra lights illuminate the area, and the word "EXIT" stays lit up even when power goes out

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know works good or not. it has arrived broken parts an I returned

customer_reviews.title: Better Then Expected!
customer_reviews.text: A great deal. Bought these to replace a defective one at our facility, and they are a better quality than the ones that were installed. Bigger battery for the back-up lights too. Really nice.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: This is the second ones I bought for my business. My husband said it was easy to installed and it passes the inspection.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Good quality product. Excellent replacement option or for new buildouts. Remember to read the instructions and plug in the battery after wiring up.

customer_reviews.title: remember to plug in battery
customer_reviews.text: It works good, just need to remember to plug in the battery. There is no paper instruction or label to tell you to plug it in.

customer_reviews.title: nice that it gives you a 277V option
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some ancient broke down exit signs in our warehouse, nice that it gives you a 277V option. The knockouts are a little tough but I just dremeled out the holes I needed. Whole replacement job took 10 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product Description--Not Remote Capable
customer_reviews.text: The specifications say these are REMOTE CAPABLE, which is what I needed. The instruction sheet shows where to find the jack to plug in the remote lights on the circuit board, but the only problem is -- there is only a printed image of a jack, but no jack. THESE ARE NOT REMOTE CAPABLE!!!

product_meta.title: Sunco Lighting Double Sided LED Emergency EXIT Sign, Two LED Flood Lights, Backup Battery, US Standard Red Letter Emergency Exit Lighting, Commercial Grade, 120-277V, Fire Resistant (UL 94V-0)
feature_bullets: Top Rated Red Double Sided Emergency Exit Sign with Adjustable Flood Lights

✅ SAFETY FIRST - The exit sign has bright adjustable (360 degrees) floodlights on each side of the sign for maximum visibility. US standard red 6" high letters with 3/4" stroke are visible from up to 100 feet away. In case of a power outage, the backup battery automatically illuminates (90 minutes) the fixture and light the way to safety.

✅ DUAL MOUNTING - Sunco's LED emergency exit sign includes an extra face plate to convert the fixture from single-sided to double-sided. For single-sided install, mount on the back or top of the fixture. For double-sided install, mount to the ceiling on the top of the fixture. Mounting equipment is included inside of the fixture.

✅ COMMERCIAL GRADE - Our emergency exit sign is built to fit your safety needs from offices, schools, retail spaces and everything in between. Specifications: 120-277V, Test Switch, Backup Battery, ABS Fire Resistant Plastic, Double Sided, Dual Mounting. Certifications: UL Listed.

✅ SUNCO BENEFITS - 3-Year Warranty! We uphold the highest standards for all our products by testing each product for optimal performance and safety. Sunco is proudly based in the USA, offering quality products at affordable prices backed by knowledgeable support specialists.

specifications.Special Features: Shatter resistant, Backup Battery, Instant On, Fire Resistant
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
